bill_title: Honoring Barbara Dowling of Sioux Falls as South Dakota's 2006 Teacher of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Barbara Dowling of Sioux Falls as South Dakota's 2006 Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Barbara Dowling, an early childhood developmental and special education teacher at Hawthorne Elementary School, was chosen as the 2006 South Dakota Teacher of the Year and will represent South Dakota in the national competition for Teacher of the Year; and WHEREAS, she has dedicated more than thirty-four years to the teaching profession; and WHEREAS, she strives to create a joyful, open, and positive environment for learning, and works tirelessly, adapting her teaching methods and lesson plans to ensure the success of her students; and WHEREAS, she instills confidence and hope in students, parents, and peers; and WHEREAS, she believes that every child can learn and grow with support, kindness, patience, and guidance: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-first Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Barbara Dowling be congratulated upon her selection as South Dakota's 2006 Teacher of the Year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Barbara Dowling of Sioux Falls as South Dakota's 2006 Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Barbara Dowling, an early childhood developmental and special education teacher at Hawthorne Elementary School, was chosen as the 2006 South Dakota Teacher of the Year and will represent South Dakota in the national competition for Teacher of the Year; and WHEREAS, she has dedicated more than thirty-four years to the teaching profession; and WHEREAS, she strives to create a joyful, open, and positive environment for learning, and works tirelessly, adapting her teaching methods and lesson plans to ensure the success of her students; and WHEREAS, she instills confidence and hope in students, parents, and peers; and WHEREAS, she believes that every child can learn and grow with support, kindness, patience, and guidance: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-first Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Barbara Dowling be congratulated upon her selection as South Dakota's 2006 Teacher of the Year.
